## Converters.generic() function

Helper function to create a [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) from a supplied [ConverterFunc](./ts-utils.conversion.converterfunc.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function generic<T, TC = unknown>(convert: ConverterFunc<T, TC>): Converter<T, TC>;
```
